fungarium: Enabling the use of fungaria collections data for comprehensive trait analyses in R Preface

fungarium: Enabling the use of fungaria collections data for comprehensive trait analyses in R Hunter J. Simpson 2021-04-10 Preface This book provides detailed guidance on how to use the R package fungarium for comprehensive analyses of ecological traits in fungi. These methods were first outlined by Simpson and Schilling (2021), who used fire-association as an example trait. To maintain consistency, fire-association is used as an example trait in this book as well.
